ruleChapterList:
<js>(function(result){
	var list = [];
	eval('('+new String(result).replace(/,\]/g,"]")+')').data.list.forEach(function(chapters){
		Array.prototype.push.apply(list, chapters.list);
	});	
return JSON.stringify(list);
})(result)</js>@json:$

u1="::"; u2="&&";
importClass (org.jsoup.Jsoup);
function get (x,y){
list=Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(x)).select(y).toArray().map(a=>a.text()+u1+a.attr("href")).join(u2);return list}
result=get(www,css).replace(/\/h5\/.+?\?/g,"/h5/ajax/category/details?pageSize=10&pageNum=searchPage&");

<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageSize = data.comments.length;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; // NaN
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for(var i = 0; i < list.length; i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'ç¬¬' + index + 'é¡µ', url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}
list;
</js>
